Two by Twos sect faces scrutiny as Bill Easton admits to decades of abuse https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-by-twos-sect-faces-scrutiny-as-bill-easton-admits-to-decades-of-abuse/DKZ2NEH6TZDD7GTSSB2WZKVYTE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-by-twos-sect-faces-scrutiny-as-bill-easton-admits-to-decades-of-abuse/DKZ2NEH6TZDD7GTSSB2WZKVYTE/ The former minister of the cult the Two by Twos has pleaded guilty to sex offences. Tue, 24 Sep 2024 22:05:36 +0000 William Easton, a former member of the religous sect The Two by Two's pleaded guilty in the Kaikohe District Court to more than 40 charges of sexual offending on boys. Photo / Shannon Pitman

Facial recognition tech cuts serious assaults by 130 in Foodstuffs North Island stores https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/facial-recognition-tech-cuts-serious-assaults-by-130-in-foodstuffs-north-island-stores/R4FKTAPEANFLPL3LU3P434J6F4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/facial-recognition-tech-cuts-serious-assaults-by-130-in-foodstuffs-north-island-stores/R4FKTAPEANFLPL3LU3P434J6F4/ Early results indicate 130 incidences of serious assaults and verbal abuse were avoided. Photo / 123RF
